id.description: Unique action identifier (within the current step)

meta.description: Abitrary metadata that you may use to describe the action.

isAutomatic.description: Whether or not execution of the action occurs using automatic triggers or must be manually triggered.

condition.description: Optional condition for the action. If specified, the action will only be executed if the condition evaluates true.

defaultResult.description: The default result for this action. If no conditional results are defined or evaluate true, this result will be executed.

conditionalResults.description: Array of conditional results that are only chosen if their condition evaluates true.
